name: Face-value European Alliance for Ticketing
goal: We are a newly established European alliance, formed to promote face-value resale of entertainment event tickets, and encourage ticket resale marketplaces to operate with greater transparency, ultimately transforming the resale space into a better place for consumers. FEAT’s members include Europe’s leading independent promoters, who are increasingly disheartened by the way that fans are being treated.
interests: Budget, Business and Industry, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives: Consumer Rights Directive and the REFIT of EU Consumer Law, Enforcement and competition law, Unfair commercial practices and contract terms, Creative Europe, E-commerce, Digital Single market
